name: Calendly Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Calendly events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Calendly Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Calendly events occur

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey
available_options: API Key or Personal Access Token (值: apiKey)

deprecationNotice.displayName: Action required: Calendly will discontinue API Key authentication on May 31, 2025. Update node to use OAuth2 authentication now to ensure your workflows continue to work.
deprecationNotice.name: deprecationNotice
deprecationNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action required: Calendly will discontinue API Key authentication on May 31, 2025. Update node to use OAuth2 authentication now to ensure your workflows continue to work.

scope.name: scope
scope.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scope | 提示: Ignored if you are using an API Key | 默认值: user | (必填项)
available_options: Organization (值: organization) - Triggers the webhook for all subscribed events within the organization
User (值: user) - Triggers the webhook for subscribed events that belong to the current user

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Event Created (值: invitee.created) - Receive notifications when a new Calendly event is created
Event Canceled (值: invitee.canceled) - Receive notifications when a Calendly event is canceled
